EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Honeywell AERO Tech Forum.2020 Honeywell Aero Tech Forum Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: It’s not too late! You can still catch Honeywell Aerospace sessions and more from the Tech Forum!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.honeywell.com/en-us/tech-forum?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=hon-corp_techforum2020&utm_content=aero]]>
DON’T MISS OUR INDUSTRY’S FUTURE IN THE MAKING!
The Honeywell Tech Forum 2020 has delivered incredible insights and conversation so far! Visit the forum site <[[https://vshow.on24.com/vshow/HW2020/lobby/18102]]> to watch on-demand content for all the Honeywell Aerospace sessions, including the opening session where Mike Madsen, President & CEO of Honeywell Aerospace caught up with Jon Roitman, Executive VP and Chief Operations Officer of United Airlines. Explore business panels on cleaner air travel and business aviation connectivity, transformation tracks, demos and more in Aerospace and across all of Honeywell’s businesses. And be sure to join us for the closing session on October 28th at 11:00am EDT, where we’ll address what’s happening in the world today, including recapping the past month, and where we are going from here!
REGISTER HERE <[[https://www.honeywell.com/en-us/tech-forum?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=hon-corp_techforum2020&utm_content=aero]]>
{{my.28 Oct:default=MARK YOUR CALENDAR}}
© {{my.year}} Honeywell International Inc. This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
